text: Ezɨ gumazir kaba pura tiariba akara egha uan akar onganir kabav gɨa ghaze, erara dera. Me gumazamiziba apezeperava me gamima, me naviba dɨkavava arazir poroghamiba uari isava akuiba, ko nivafɨzimɨn arazir kurar igharazibar amuasa nɨghnɨsi. Ezɨ arazir kamɨn, me gumazamizir datɨrɨghɨra navibagh iragha egha arazir kuraba ataghiziba, me me gamima me gumazir kurar kabar gɨn zui.
